nodes.text: Foodboards, also spelled "food-boards," were used in Dexter Jettster's restaurant on the planet Coruscant, Dex's Diner, before the establishment was destroyed in 19 BBY. Sliders were served on top of grilled, trans-shipped, medium-density food-boards.
Kal Skirata served sliced foodboard to the young Null ARC troopers in his quarters on Kamino. In his opinion, it looked "less appetizing than the tray" it was on.
Foodboards first appeared in Star Wars: Attack of the Clones: The Visual Dictionary. They were later identified in the Databank on StarWars.com.
